I'm Jay Rambhia. I'm interested in Computer Vision and Pattern Recognition. Currenlty I'm working on visual based tracking algorithms.

By Jay Rambhia

About Me

Jay Rambhia jayrambhia777@gmail.com jayrambhia.com

Howdy!

Hey, I am Jay Rambhia. I’m interested in solving real world problems using Computer Vision. I want to track every object which has the rarest possibility of being tracked. Yeah, I’m paranoid.

So, what all do I do?

I love to code. I write various applicaitons using Python and C++, especially Computer Vision based applications. I have participated in Google Summer of Code 2012 with SimpleCV. I believe in open source and I’m an active developer of SimpleCV. You can fork my work on Github.

As much as I love to code

I love to teach. I have been taking workshops on Basics of Python in my college. I also teach Introduction to Computer Vision under CTE along with Ameya and Siddharth.

Along with all this, I also have a nag for design. I had been selected for MIT Media Labs - Design Innovation workshop where I proptotyped a haptic pen for blind people with Aditi and Nikita.

How to Contact Me

Just go ahead and follow me on Twitter.Don't worry I won't try to track you on Twitter. If you're afraid of that, then you can drop me a mail. If you're looking for my codes, then you can fork my repositories on Github.

That's me
